mapper.insert: insert into interest_interest( name, type_id,is_leaf,parent_id) values(#{nodeName},#{typeId},#{isLeaf}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: select interest_id as interestId, name as nodeName, type_id as typeId, parent_id as parentId, is_leaf as isLeaf from interest_interest where interest_id = #{id} limit 1;
select interest_id as interestId, name as nodeName, type_id as typeId, parent_id as parentId, is_leaf as isLeaf from interest_interest where name = #{name} limit 1;

select a.interest_id as interestId, a.name as nodeName, a.type_id as typeId, a.parent_id as parentId, a.is_leaf as isLeaf from interest_interest a inner join interest_user_interest b on a.interest_id = b.interest_id where b.user_id = #{userId} ;
select id as id, user_id as userId, interest_id as interestId, weight as weight from interest_user_interest where user_id = #{userId} and interest_id = #{interestId}
mapper.insert: insert into interest_user_interest( user_id, interest_id, weight) values ( #{userId}, #{interestId}, #{weight})
